isis.stitle: SINGLE SPEED REAR AXLE: INTERNATIONAL - INSTALL - CARRIER INTO AXLE HOUSING

step1.para: Thoroughly clean the inside of the carrier housing and inspect the housing mounting surface for nicks and general cleanliness. Stone the surface if necessary to remove burrs or nicks.
Apply a 1/4 inch bead of RTV gasket material onto the housing carrier mounting flange and around each bolt hole ( Figure 72).
Thread 2 studs into housing 180° apart. This will eliminate rotation of carrier assembly after it makes contact with the RTV gasket material.

Install carrier assembly into housing. Clean mounting bolts, coat with Loctite #277 (red) or equivalent, and install. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICANTS AND SEALERS in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual. Refer to the TORQUE CHART, for proper fastener torque.
Allow one hour cure time for RTV gasket material before adding hypoid lubricant.
Remove old axle flange gasket and clean mating surfaces of hub and axle flange.
Install the axle shafts to proper location. Refer to the TORQUE CHART, for proper torque specifications of axle flange nuts.
Clean and install drain plug. Fill unit to proper level with hypoid gear lubricant.
